author: cnbc.com
title: Hershey Declares Quarterly Dividends
text:
HERSHEY, Pa., Feb. 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of The Hershey Company (NYSE:HSY) today announced quarterly dividends of $0.656 on the Common Stock and $0.596 on the Class B Common Stock. The dividends were declared on January 31, 2018 and are payable March 15, 2018 to stockholders of record February 23, 2018. It is the 353 rd consecutive regular dividend on the Common Stock and the 134 th consecutive regular dividend on the Class B Common Stock.
FINANCIAL CONTACT: MEDIA CONTACT: Mark Pogharian Jennifer Sniderman 717-534-7556 717-534-6275
Source:The Hershey Company
